oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Holly Ridge Cemetery: Dr. Carroll Van West, Brian Dempsey, and Allan Hammons in front of the Patton historical marker
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of Prof. Carroll Van West and graduate student Brian Dempsey of MTSU with Allan Hammons in front of the Charley Patton historical marker.

Holly Ridge Cemetery, located in the heart of the Mississippi Delta, received the first of many historical markers erected to mark the Mississippi Blues Trail. The cemetery includes the grave of Charley Patton, who is considered one of the earliest performers in Delta blues tradition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cemeteries; Musicians
Blues music; Cemeteries
